_header: Though that men do call it dotage
Note:
See Ringler Jr. (1992)
XRingler Jr., William A. Bibliography and Index of English Verse in Manuscript 1501-1558. London: Mansell, 1992; prepared and completed by Michael Rudick and Susan J. Ringler , TM 1708.
Subjects: Constancy in Love; love, vicissitudes of
_description: ?Henry VIII, Constancy in Love, attributed to Henry VIII — ten couplets

BLAdd31922.First Lines: Thow that men do call it dotagewho louyth not wantith corage…
BLAdd31922.Last Lines: …ffor who so louith shold loue butt ooneChaunge who so wyll I wyll be none
BLAdd31922.Note: Three sets of notes for first couplet for three voices.
